events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly. Thank you for your interest in our engineering team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills in software development and relevant experience.
A recruiter from our Engineering team has been assigned to your application and will contact you soon to discuss the next steps.
The initial screening interview has been completed successfully. Your technical background aligns well with the requirements of the software engineer role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th. This will focus on coding skills, system design, and problem-solving related to our engineering challenges.
The technical interview was completed and feedback is very positive. You demonstrated strong knowledge in software development and problem solving.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th to discuss your career goals, cultural fit, and other employment details.
The HR interview was completed successfully and the feedback indicates a very good cultural fit with our company values.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the software engineer position. Please review the attached details and let us know your decision.
Thank you for the offer. I have reviewed the terms and I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to your engineering team.
I am happy to formally accept the job offer and look forward to starting as a software engineer at your company.
Your onboarding process has started. Welcome aboard! We have scheduled training sessions to get you up to speed with our engineering practices.
The hiring case is now closed successfully. All onboarding steps have been completed and you are now formally part of our Engineering team.
